name: IOBluetoothHandsFreeDeviceDelegate
desc: A set of optional methods for receiving status change updates and information about a connected Bluetooth hands-free phone or headset.

items.name: func handsFree(IOBluetoothHandsFreeDevice!, callSetupMode: NSNumber!)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the call setup indicator of the connected Bluetooth hands-free phone or headset has changed.

items.name: func handsFree(IOBluetoothHandsFreeDevice!, isCallActive: NSNumber!)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the active call indicator of the connected Bluetooth hands-free phone or headset has changed.

items.name: func handsFree(IOBluetoothHandsFreeDevice!, isServiceAvailable: NSNumber!)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the service level indicator of the connected Bluetooth hands-free phone or headset has changed.

items.name: func handsFree(IOBluetoothHandsFreeDevice!, signalStrength: NSNumber!)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the call setup signal strength indicator of the connected Bluetooth hands-free phone or headset has changed.

items.name: func handsFree(IOBluetoothHandsFreeDevice!, callHoldState: NSNumber!)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the call held indicator of the connected Bluetooth hands-free phone or headset has changed.

items.name: func handsFree(IOBluetoothHandsFreeDevice!, isRoaming: NSNumber!)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the roaming indicator of the connected Bluetooth hands-free phone or headset has changed.

items.name: func handsFree(IOBluetoothHandsFreeDevice!, batteryCharge: NSNumber!)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the battery level indicator of the connected Bluetooth hands-free phone or headset has changed.

items.name: func handsFree(IOBluetoothHandsFreeDevice!, incomingCallFrom: String!)
items.desc: Tells the delegate there’s an incoming call on the connected Bluetooth hands-free phone or headset.

items.name: func handsFree(IOBluetoothHandsFreeDevice!, currentCall: [AnyHashable : Any]!)
items.desc: Sends the delegate information about the current call.

items.name: func handsFree(IOBluetoothHandsFreeDevice!, incomingSMS: [AnyHashable : Any]!)
items.desc: Tells the delegate there’s an incoming text message.

items.name: func handsFree(IOBluetoothHandsFreeDevice!, subscriberNumber: String!)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the subscriber number of a call.

items.name: func handsFree(IOBluetoothHandsFreeDevice!, ringAttempt: NSNumber!)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the phone is ringing.

items.name: func handsFree(IOBluetoothHandsFreeDevice!, unhandledResultCode: String!)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the phone sent an unknown code.
